page.title: 15Fishing in the Urr
page.content: In the Urr there is good fishing and a good selection of fish - salmon, trout, eels, pike and other small fish. The fish that is mainly sought after is the salmon. The Urr is usually packed with eels that will take any bait that is set for the salmon, trout or pike. About a hundred people a year come to fish in the Urr from all over Britain. A few of the local people also fish. They are allowed to fish for salmon from April to August, trout from May to August, eels and pike all the year round. You can get a yearly permit from Tommy's Sport Shop in Castle Douglas for Â£4. To fish in the Croys stretch you can get a free permit at Croys.
